text: Bruno Daniel Marie Paul Retailleau (born 20 November 1960) is a French politician. He has been the Minister of the Interior in the government of Michel Barnier since 21 September 2024. Retailleau represented the Vend√©e department in the National Assembly from 1994 to 1997. He was in the Senate from 2004 to 2024. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maine-et-Loire Category:French politicians
title: Bruno Retailleau
